suppress.notes: Suppressing as it's a false positive (see: https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258)

https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-1258 False positive -- we do not use Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE (5.0.8.RELEASE at the time of writing) Additionally, we do not use Spring method security annotations which are the specific vulnerability
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22112 Temporary suppression until upgrade to Spring Boot 2.4.x
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22118 Spring Framework vulnerability, subject to review after Spring Boot upgrade to 2.4.x
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-28170 Spring Framework vulnerability, subject to review after Spring Boot upgrade to 2.4.x affected lib org.glassfish:jakarta.el:3.0.3
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22119 Spring Framework vulnerability, subject to review after Spring Boot upgrade to 2.4.x affected lib Spring Security and related to DoS attack

https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-23171 Spring Framework vulnerability, https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2020-23171 nim-lang all versions affected https://github.com/nim-lang/zip/issues/54
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22096#range-7096083 Temporary suppression until upgrade to Spring Boot 2.4.x https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/117.html
